txt.en: Kite-flying locations can be found throughout Hobbiton encircling the Party Tree. They are atop the Hill, near the Appledores, on the river-front south of the Grange, on the hill with a camp-fire to the east of the Party Tree, and in the meadow to the east of Bag End.\n\nYou should fly each of the summer-themed kites and enjoy the summer breezes.

'My favourite addition to the festival this year is certainly the lovely summer-themed kites! When I fly them, I picture that I'm up there myself, like a bird. But then I get frightened of the idea of being so high up, and pull them back down. Never can be too careful!\n\n'You should go fly some for yourself, [placeholder]! The craftsmanship is simply marvellous.'
'Did you enjoy flying the kites, [placeholder]? I cannot wait to pluck up the courage to have another go!'
Hargold Hardbottle can be found at the party tree in Hobbiton.\n\nYou should speak with Hargold Hardbottle.
Kites can be flown at the Summer Festival from various locations in Hobbiton.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends.</rgb>
